name: NSTabView.TabType
desc: These constants specify the tab viewâ€™s type as used by the tabViewType property.

items.name: case topTabsBezelBorder
items.desc: The view includes tabs on the top of the view and has a bezeled border (the default).

items.name: case noTabsBezelBorder
items.desc: The view does not include tabs and has a bezeled border.

items.name: case noTabsLineBorder
items.desc: The view does not include tabs and has a lined border.

items.name: case noTabsNoBorder
items.desc: The view does not include tabs and has no border.

items.name: case bottomTabsBezelBorder
items.desc: Tabs are on the bottom of the view with a bezeled border.

items.name: case leftTabsBezelBorder
items.desc: Tabs are on the left of the view with a bezeled border.

items.name: case rightTabsBezelBorder
items.desc: Tabs are on the right of the view with a bezeled border.
